info: Разговорный и письменный английский на уровне Intermediate и выше;

info: Участие в сложных проектах и профессиональную команду;

Удобное расположение офиса в центре города;

card_description.name: Preferred skills and experience:
info: Solid English knowledge (fluent written and spoken);
Experience in development of new sales channels;
Experience in sales of IT service or in IT industry in general;
Experience in working with different sales platforms (remote employment services, LinkedIn, angel.co, etc);
Perfect skills in business communication, problem-solving attitude while working with clients and readiness for close cooperation with colleagues;
Skills to analyse information and overcome objections.

card_description.name: Nice to have:
info: Experience of setting up and streamlining sales pipelines with individual approach and touch;
Understanding of technical part, stack of technologies, web and mobile development in general;
Understanding of software development approaches and techniques.

card_description.name: Responsibilities:
info: Acquiring and development of different connections with new business partners;
Understanding of different business needs to apply this knowledge to solve the client's needs;
Collecting information about the market and clients;
Negotiation skills and successful business deal closing;
Development of sales plan and achieving company's milestones.
